body.raw:
## Installation ## Folder structure ## Usage The `RealtimeAvatarStack` component renders stacked avatars which are connected to Supabase Realtime. It uses the Presence feature of Supabase Realtime. You can use this to show currently online users in a chatroom, game session or collaborative app. ```tsx import { RealtimeAvatarStack } from '@/components/realtime-avatar-stack' export default function Page() { return (

Lumon Industries

) } ``` ## Props | Prop | Type | Default | Description | | ---------- | -------- | ------- | ---------------------------------------------------- | | `roomName` | `string` | `null` | The name of the Supabase Realtime room to connect to | ## Further reading - [Realtime Presence](https://supabase.com/docs/guides/realtime/presence) - [Realtime authorization](https://supabase.com/docs/guides/realtime/authorization)
